In this post, we will be creating a simple scalable dashboard that updates in real-time using React, GraphQL Subscriptions and Redis PubSub. Real-time dashboards can be used to monitor your infrastructure (servers, network, applications), application traffic (transaction volume, number of users), alerts (application health, critical issues, downtimes) etc. Almost always, dashboards are backed up with one or more datasources.

What open-source applications are used for creating feature-rich dashboards?

  • Kibana - Used with ELK Stack
  • Grafana - Used with Prometheus, Graphite, OpenTSDB
